title: The Rink [Silent version]
brief_description: In this sketch, derived partly from an old Karno sketch, Chaplin portrays a waiter who spends lunchtime at a roller rink. A comic excursion in Chaplinesque humour and movement involving a love story and Chaplin’s fandangos on the rink.
